items.text: I bought an air fryer from Bayti, delivery was very fast to Setif and the product is original as described. Thank you!
items.author: Ahmed Ben Mohamed

items.text: The best thing is their after-sales service. I had a simple issue and they replied quickly via WhatsApp.
items.author: Sara Lamari

items.text: Really high quality. Every corner of my kitchen now has a touch of Bayti. Cash on delivery really gives peace of mind.
items.author: Leila Khalil
